column3: Huh! I didn't intend to close this, sorry. Tried to squash it. Will open a new pull for that.\n
Concept ACK, although it would be nice to specify here how to use the script (eg, what to type to build, like the rest of the document) instead of just referring to it.\n
I've made some changes today. What do you think?\n
Please add a newline between the header and the text (also below).\n
Initially missed it, ended up as two commits, but done. Thanks for the suggestions.\n
